header: David Plans to Build the Temple(A)

verse: After the king had settled down in his palace and the Lord had given him respite from all of his surrounding enemies,
he told the prophet Nathan, “Look now, I’m living in a cedar palace, but the Ark of God resides behind a tent curtain.”
Nathan replied to the king, “Go do everything you have in mind, because the Lord is with you.”
But later that same night, this message came to Nathan from the Lord:
Nathan communicated this complete oracle to David with precisely these words.
Then King David went in to the presence of the Lord, sat down, and said:
